00027 class BBSImpl
00028 {
00029 public:
00030     BBSImpl();
00031     virtual ~BBSImpl();
00032 
00033     virtual bool look(const char*) = 0;
00034 
00035     virtual void take(const char*) = 0; /* blocks til something to take */
00036     virtual bool look_take(const char*) = 0; /* returns false if nothing to take */
00037     // after taking use these
00038     virtual int upkint() = 0;
00039     virtual double upkdouble() = 0;
00040     virtual void upkvec(int, double*) = 0;
00041     virtual char* upkstr() = 0; // delete [] char* when finished
00042 
00043     // before posting use these
00044     virtual void pkbegin() = 0;
00045     virtual void pkint(int) = 0;
00046     virtual void pkdouble(double) = 0;
00047     virtual void pkvec(int, double*) = 0;
00048     virtual void pkstr(const char*) = 0;
00049     virtual void post(const char*) = 0;
00050 
00051     virtual void post_todo(int parentid) = 0;
00052     virtual void post_result(int id) = 0;
00053     virtual int look_take_result(int pid) = 0; // returns id, or 0 if nothing
00054     virtual int look_take_todo() = 0; // returns id, or 0 if nothing
00055     virtual int take_todo() = 0; // returns id
00056     virtual void save_args(int userid) = 0;
00057     virtual void return_args(int userid);
00058 
00059     virtual void execute(int id); // assumes a "todo" message in receive buffer
00060     virtual int submit(int userid);
00061     virtual bool working(int &id, double& x, int& userid);
00062     virtual void context();
00063 
00064     virtual void start();
00065     virtual void done();
00066 
00067     virtual void worker(); // forever execute
00068     virtual bool is_master();
00069     double time();
00070 
00071     virtual void perror(const char*);
00072 public:
00073     double ac_;
00074     int working_id_, n_;
00075     double wait_time_;
00076     double integ_time_;
00077     double send_time_;
00078     static bool is_master_;
00079     static bool started_, done_;
00080     static int mytid_;
00081     static int debug_;
00082 protected:
00083     void execute_helper(); // involves hoc specific details in ocbbs.c
00084 };
